course.title: Developmental Neurobiology
course.faculty_text: Lisa V. Goodrich (Medical School), Michela Fagiolini (Medical School), Chenghua Gu (Medical School), and Beth Stevens (Medical School)
course.description: Advanced topics in nervous system development, including embryonic and adult neurogenesis, axon guidance, synapse development, and critical periods. Focus on current areas of investigation, unresolved questions, and common experimental approaches.
course.prerequisites: Neurobiology 200 or with permission of instructor.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as NB 720.0. Includes reading and discussion of primary literature aimed towards identifying important questions and developing a feasible research plan. The final exam consists of a grant proposal.
